item.title: 巴菲特对贸易协议的看法
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）在周末宣布他 94 岁退休后说的最中肯的话不是他对肆虐全球经济的关税的看法（他并不赞成），而是他对伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）3500 亿美元现金的辩护。他说，这是他恪守原则的结果，即只投资于能提供有意义回报的交易，而他认为最近这样的交易并不多。【原文：The most pertinent thing Warren Buffett said at the weekend beyond announcing his retirement at age 94 wasn’t his thoughts on the tariffs roiling the global economy (he’s not a fan) but his defense of Berkshire Hathaway’s $350 billion cash pile. It was, he said, a consequence of abiding by his principle to invest only in deals that offered meaningful returns and his view there had not been many lately.】

item.description:
这位著名投资人将伯克希尔哈撒韦公司及其3500亿美元现金堆的钥匙交给了格雷格-阿贝尔。【原文：

item.title: 欧盟将提出 5 亿欧元一揽子计划吸引科研人员
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周一在巴黎表示，欧盟将提出一项5亿欧元（5.669亿美元）的一揽子计划，以吸引科学家到欧洲工作。【原文：The European Union will propose a €500 million ($566.9 million) package to attract scientists to Europe, Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Monday in Paris.】

item.title: 马来西亚寻求在谈判中将美国征收的关税降至零
item.description: 马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部长扎弗鲁尔-阿齐兹（Zafrul Aziz）表示，马来西亚正在与美国进行谈判，以便将美国对东南亚国家征收的关税从唐纳德-特朗普总统承诺的24%降至零。【原文：Malaysia is negotiating with the US to bring its tariffs on the Southeast Asian nation down to zero, from the 24% that President Donald Trump pledged to impose, according to Investment, Trade and Industry Minister Zafrul Aziz.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃将于 5 月 7 日会见比尔-盖茨
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托表示，他将于本周会见比尔-盖茨，这位亿万富翁慈善家将为东南亚国家的社会项目提供支持。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto said he will meet Bill Gates this week, with the billionaire philanthropist offering support for social programs in the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 香港购入更多美元以捍卫货币联系汇率制
item.description: 在香港货币再次测试其交易区间的上限后，香港当局进一步干预市场，加紧购买美元以捍卫外汇挂钩。【原文：Hong Kong authorities further intervened in the market, stepping up purchases of US dollars to defend the foreign exchange peg after the city’s currency again tested the upper end of its trading band.】

item.title: Palantir 的爆仓史面临华尔街最高倍数的收购
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. 的投资者一直在赌周一收盘后的业绩会再次井喷，但最近的上涨给该股设置了很高的门槛。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. investors have been betting that the results coming after the markets close on Monday will be another blowout, but the recent run up has given the stock a high bar to clear.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚达纳塔拉公司与埃拉美公司就镍矿交易进行谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，印尼达纳塔拉公司（Danantara）和法国矿业公司埃拉美公司（Eramet SA）正在商谈组建合伙企业，在东南亚国家投资一家镍厂，这可能是该国家投资基金的第一笔重大交易。【原文：Indonesia’s Danantara and French miner Eramet SA are in talks to form a partnership that would invest in a nickel plant in the Southeast Asian nation, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be the state investment fund’s first major transaction.】

item.title: 投资者要求私人信贷，战神公司获得 200 亿美元投资
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 在第一季度发布了创纪录的虚无策略和机会策略需求后，表明私人信贷的发展势头远未减弱。【原文：Ares Management Corp. showed that momentum for private credit is far from waning, after posting record demand across its vanilla and opportunistic strategies in the first quarter.】

item.title: 台湾股市在货币大涨中迎来第二日资金流入
item.description: 全球基金对台币的持续飙升及其可能对出口商收益造成的影响仍无动于衷，连续第二个交易日抢购岛内股票。【原文：Global funds remained unfazed by the Taiwan dollar’s relentless surge and its likely impact on exporters’ earnings, snapping up the island’s shares for a second straight session.】

item.title: 大选加深政治动荡，罗马尼亚资产暴跌
item.description: 在极右翼候选人赢得第一轮总统选举后，罗马尼亚资产周一遭到抛售，加深了脆弱的执政联盟的动荡。【原文：Romanian assets sold off Monday after a far-right candidate won the first round of a presidential election, deepening the turmoil around the fragile ruling coalition.】

item.title: 股价强势反弹，动能成为强大盟友
item.description: 有很多理由怀疑美股的反弹，但它至少有一个强大的因素：势头。【原文：There are many reasons to doubt the rebound in US stocks, but it has at least one powerful factor on its side: momentum.】

item.title: 谷歌授予马来西亚 Gamuda 数据中心合同
item.description: 据公司文件显示，马来西亚基础设施公司 Gamuda Bhd 从谷歌马来西亚子公司获得了一份价值超过 10 亿林吉特（约合 2.37 亿美元）的数据中心合同。【原文：Malaysian infrastructure firm Gamuda Bhd. won a data-center contract worth over 1 billion ringgit ($237 million) from Google’s Malaysian affiliate, according to company filings.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔称保护主义可能削弱繁荣
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，新一轮保护主义浪潮可能会损害全球经济。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said a new wave of protectionism could damage economies around the world.】

item.title: 塔式研究公司在市场反弹之际加大加密货币押注
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对数字资产的追捧，机构投资者重拾对数字资产的兴趣，高速交易巨头塔塔研究资本公司（Tower Research Capital）内一个鲜为人知的团队正悄悄加大对加密货币的押注。【原文：A little-known team within high-speed trading giant Tower Research Capital is quietly bulking up its bets on cryptocurrencies, as institutional players regain their appetite for digital assets following President Donald Trump’s embrace of the industry.】

item.title: 在美国加征关税前，iPhone 制造商鸿海 4 月销售额激增 26
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., the main contract manufacturer for Apple Inc. and Nvidia Corp., said its April revenue rose 26%, likely boosted by the hastening of orders ahead of US tariffs that could upend business for its customers.】

item.title: 沙特进军印度炼油业因原油供应问题停滞不前
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯在印度两家炼油厂的投资进展受到了原油供应缺乏共识的阻碍。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s progress in securing investment in two oil refineries in India is being held back by a lack of consensus around crude supply, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星公司更换首席执行官，欧洲力图打造星链竞争者
item.description: 欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat Communications SA）的首席执行官伊娃-贝内克（Eva Berneke）被一位电信高管取代，因为欧洲正寻求开发一种本土的替代方案，以取代埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）。【原文：Satellite operator Eutelsat Communications SA replaced Chief Executive Officer Eva Berneke with a telecommunications executive as Europe seeks to develop a homegrown alternative to Elon Musk’s Starlink.】

item.title: 汇率飙升，台湾监管机构传唤人寿保险公司
item.description: 台湾市场监管机构正在会见岛内最大的几家保险公司，因为当地货币暴涨给数千亿美元的美国债券投资带来了压力。【原文：Taiwan’s markets regulator is meeting some of the island’s largest insurers as a skyrocketing local currency piles pressure on hundreds of billions of dollars in US bond investments.】

item.title: 欧盟将提议在 2027 年底前禁止进口俄罗斯天然气
item.description: 欧盟将提出在 2027 年底前禁止进口俄罗斯天然气的措施，因为该集团正努力切断与这个曾经是其最大能源供应国的关系。【原文：The European Union is set to propose measures to ban Russian gas imports by the end of 2027, as the bloc pushes to sever ties with the country that was once its biggest energy supplier.】

item.title: 印度和巴基斯坦濒临一场双方都无法承受的冲突
item.description: 继上个月印度游客在克什米尔遭到毁灭性袭击后，印度和巴基斯坦成为多年来最接近军事冲突的国家。对于这两个拥有核武器的国家的经济来说，这场动荡来得正是时候。【原文：India and Pakistan are the closest they’ve been to military conflict in years following last month’s devastating attack on Indian tourists in Kashmir. The turmoil couldn’t come at a worse time for the economies of the two nuclear-armed nations.】

item.title: 能源需求落后于供应，欧洲天然气追随石油下跌
item.description: 由于能源需求前景跟不上供应前景，欧洲天然气走低。【原文：European natural gas edged lower as prospects for energy demand fail to keep pace with the outlook for supply.】

item.title: 西班牙在大停电当天披露新的电网故障
item.description: 西班牙政府表示，在该国有史以来最大规模的停电事故发生之前，西班牙高压电网遭受的发电中断比之前已知的要多。【原文：Spain’s high-voltage electricity grid suffered more power generation disruptions than previously known ahead of the country’s largest ever blackout, the government said.】

item.title: 随着需求增长，南非 Eskom 公司减电风险降低
item.description: 南非国家电力公司表示，其电力网络可靠性的提高将降低今年冬季停电的风险，预计今年冬季的需求将有所增加。【原文：South Africa’s state power utility said the increased reliability of its electricity network will reduce the risk of outages this winter, when demand is expected to increase.】

item.title: 土耳其通胀略有缓解，里拉动荡减缓进展
item.description: 在主要反对派人物埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁（Ekrem Imamoglu）入狱引发里拉资产大幅下挫之后，土耳其 4 月份的通胀减速有所放缓。【原文：A deceleration in Turkey’s inflation slowed in April, after a sharp selloff in lira assets triggered by the jailing of key opposition figure Ekrem Imamoglu.】

item.title: 欧洲企业在早期贸易痛苦中的表现好于预期
item.description: 欧洲企业公布的盈利大幅超出预期，使市场有所松动，但关税和经济增长路径的不确定性继续给前景蒙上阴影。【原文：European firms are reporting earnings significantly ahead of expectations, allowing for some relief in the market, but tariffs and the uncertain path of economic growth continue to cloud the outlook.】
